title: Are New Army ‘Holistic Medics’ Treating Gunshot Wounds with Crystals and Essential Oils?
subtitle: U.S. Army medics will not be treating battlefield injuries with homeopathic dilutions and prayer beads.
author: David Mikkelson
vclaim: New U.S. Army medics will be treating battlefield injuries with "alternative medicine" such as homeopathic dilutions and prayer beads.
